name: NoteBook
description:
It's a very simple game which is still in prototype. I came up with this concept a long time ago. It is a story telling game combined with light projection and puzzles. You will need to project proper mark on the objects in the scene in order to help the story to  progress. You will gather new marks during the game, and you'll even need to combine multiple projections together to solve puzzles.

But due to my busy work, I didn't have much of time to make. So I just built up a concept game from scratch within my limited time. 

I'm really happy to join in this jam. And I really hope you can find something interesting in this game.   Enjoy!
